intro.title: Managing Remote Working Made Easy
intro.text: Built for nomadic mobility with career stability, we believe it should be effortless for freelancers and clients to work together. Pltfrm wants to create a new way to work with and for the independent workforce.

goal.title: ONE SIMPLE GOAL
goal.text: We want to make it simple for companies and contractors to collaborate all within one flexible tool. When everything you need is in one place, working together is easy.
